meanings.sent1: I concatenated the beads to make a colorful necklace.
meanings.sent2: The train cars were concatenated to form a long line.
meanings.sent3: The children concatenated their toys in a line, pretending it was a parade.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were concatenated like a string of pearls, each one leading to the next.
meanings.sent5: The music notes concatenated beautifully, creating a harmonious melody.

meanings.definition: Joined together in a chain or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The concatenated links of the chain were strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent2: The concatenated pages of the book formed a complete story.
meanings.sent3: The concatenated flavors of the dish surprised and delighted the guests.
meanings.sent4: The concatenated stars in the sky seemed to form a celestial pathway.
meanings.sent5: The concatenated colors of the painting blended seamlessly, creating a stunning masterpiece.
